verses.verse: Every wise <S%H2454><s%> woman <S%H802><s%> buildeth <S%H1129><s%> her house <S%H1004><s%>; But the foolish <S%H200><s%> plucketh it down <S%H2040><s%> with her own hands <S%H3027><s%>.
He that walketh <S%H1980><s%> in his uprightness <S%H3476><s%> feareth <S%H3373><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; But he that is perverse <S%H3868><s%> in his ways <S%H1870><s%> despiseth him <S%H959><s%>.
In the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the foolish <S%H191><s%> is a rod <S%H2415><s%> for his pride <S%H1346><s%>; But the lips <S%H8193><s%> of the wise <S%H2450><s%> shall preserve them <S%H8104><s%>.
Where no oxen <S%H504><s%> are <S%H18><s%>, the crib is clean <S%H1249><s%>; But much <S%H7230><s%> increase <S%H8393><s%> is by the strength <S%H3581><s%> of the ox <S%H7794><s%>.
A faithful <S%H529><s%> witness <S%H5707><s%> will not lie <S%H3577><s%>; But a false <S%H8267><s%> witness <S%H5707><s%> uttereth <S%H6315><s%> lies <S%H3576><s%>.
A scoffer <S%H3887><s%> seeketh <S%H1245><s%> wisdom <S%H2451><s%>, and findeth it not <S%H1847><s%>; But knowledge is easy <S%H7043><s%> unto him that hath understanding <S%H995><s%>.
Go <S%H3212><s%> into the presence <S%H5048><s%> of a foolish <S%H3684><s%> man <S%H376><s%>, And thou shalt not perceive <S%H3045><s%> in him the lips <S%H8193><s%> of knowledge <S%H1847><s%>.
The wisdom <S%H2451><s%> of the prudent <S%H6175><s%> is to understand <S%H995><s%> his way <S%H1870><s%>; But the folly <S%H200><s%> of fools <S%H3684><s%> is deceit <S%H4820><s%>.
A trespass-offering <S%H817><s%> mocketh <S%H3887><s%> fools <S%H191><s%>; But among the upright <S%H3477><s%> there is good will <S%H7522><s%>.
The heart <S%H3820><s%> knoweth <S%H3045><s%> its own <S%H5315><s%> bitterness <S%H4787><s%>; And a stranger <S%H2114><s%> doth not intermeddle <S%H6148><s%> with its joy <S%H8057><s%>.
The house <S%H1004><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> shall be overthrown <S%H8045><s%>; But the tent <S%H168><s%> of the upright <S%H3477><s%> shall flourish <S%H6524><s%>.
There is <S%H3426><s%> a way <S%H1870><s%> which seemeth right <S%H3477><s%> unto <S%H6440><s%> a man <S%H376><s%>; But the end <S%H319><s%> thereof are the ways <S%H1870><s%> of death <S%H4194><s%>.
Even in laughter <S%H7814><s%> the heart <S%H3820><s%> is sorrowful <S%H3510><s%>; And the end <S%H319><s%> of mirth <S%H8057><s%> is heaviness <S%H8424><s%>.
The backslider <S%H5472><s%> in heart <S%H3820><s%> shall be filled <S%H7646><s%> with his own ways <S%H1870><s%>; And a good <S%H2896><s%> man shall be satisfied from himself <S%H376><s%>.
The simple <S%H6612><s%> believeth <S%H539><s%> every word <S%H1697><s%>; But the prudent <S%H6175><s%> man looketh well <S%H995><s%> to his going <S%H838><s%>.

A wise <S%H2450><s%> man feareth <S%H3373><s%>, and departeth <S%H5493><s%> from evil <S%H7451><s%>; But the fool <S%H3684><s%> beareth himself insolently <S%H5674><s%>, and is confident <S%H982><s%>.
He that is soon <S%H7116><s%> angry <S%H639><s%> will deal <S%H6213><s%> foolishly <S%H200><s%>; And a man <S%H376><s%> of wicked devices <S%H4209><s%> is hated <S%H8130><s%>.
The simple <S%H6612><s%> inherit <S%H5157><s%> folly <S%H200><s%>; But the prudent <S%H6175><s%> are crowned <S%H3803><s%> with knowledge <S%H1847><s%>.
The evil <S%H7451><s%> bow <S%H7817><s%> down before <S%H6440><s%> the good <S%H2896><s%>; And the wicked <S%H7563><s%>, at the gates <S%H8179><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%>.
The poor <S%H7326><s%> is hated <S%H8130><s%> even of his own neighbor <S%H7453><s%>; But the rich <S%H6223><s%> hath many <S%H7227><s%> friends <S%H157><s%>.
He that despiseth <S%H936><s%> his neighbor <S%H7453><s%> sinneth <S%H2398><s%>; But he that hath pity <S%H2603><s%> on the poor <S%H6035><s%>, happy is he <S%H835><s%>.
Do they not err <S%H8582><s%> that devise <S%H2790><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%>? But mercy <S%H2617><s%> and truth <S%H571><s%> shall be to them that devise <S%H2790><s%> good <S%H2896><s%>.
In all labor <S%H6089><s%> there is profit <S%H4195><s%>; But the talk <S%H1697><s%> of the lips <S%H8193><s%> tendeth only to penury <S%H4270><s%>.
The crown <S%H5850><s%> of the wise <S%H2450><s%> is their riches <S%H6239><s%>; But the folly <S%H200><s%> of fools <S%H3684><s%> is only folly <S%H200><s%>.
A true <S%H571><s%> witness <S%H5707><s%> delivereth <S%H5337><s%> souls <S%H5315><s%>; But he that uttereth <S%H6315><s%> lies <S%H3577><s%> causeth deceit <S%H4820><s%>.
In the fear <S%H3374><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is strong <S%H5797><s%> confidence <S%H4009><s%>; And his children <S%H1121><s%> shall have a place of refuge <S%H4268><s%>.
The fear <S%H3374><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is a fountain <S%H4726><s%> of life <S%H2416><s%>, That one may depart <S%H5493><s%> from the snares <S%H4170><s%> of death <S%H4194><s%>.

In the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of people <S%H5971><s%> is the king <S%H4428><s%>'s glory <S%H1927><s%>; But in the want <S%H657><s%> of people <S%H3816><s%> is the destruction <S%H4288><s%> of the prince <S%H7333><s%>.

He that is slow <S%H750><s%> to anger <S%H639><s%> is of great <S%H7227><s%> understanding <S%H8394><s%>; But he that is hasty <S%H7116><s%> of spirit <S%H7307><s%> exalteth <S%H7311><s%> folly <S%H200><s%>.
A tranquil <S%H4832><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%> is the life <S%H2416><s%> of the flesh <S%H1320><s%>; But envy <S%H7068><s%> is the rottenness <S%H7538><s%> of the bones <S%H6106><s%>.
He that oppresseth <S%H6231><s%> the poor <S%H1800><s%> reproacheth <S%H2778><s%> his Maker <S%H6213><s%>; But he that hath mercy <S%H2603><s%> on the needy <S%H34><s%> honoreth him <S%H3513><s%>.
The wicked <S%H7563><s%> is thrust down <S%H1760><s%> in his evil-doing <S%H7451><s%>; But the righteous <S%H6662><s%> hath a refuge <S%H2620><s%> in his death <S%H4194><s%>.

Wisdom <S%H2451><s%> resteth <S%H5117><s%> in the heart <S%H3820><s%> of him that hath understanding <S%H995><s%>; But that which is in the inward <S%H7130><s%> part of fools <S%H3684><s%> is made known <S%H3045><s%>.
Righteousness <S%H6666><s%> exalteth <S%H7311><s%> a nation <S%H1471><s%>; But sin <S%H2403><s%> is a reproach <S%H2617><s%> to any people <S%H3816><s%>.
The king <S%H4428><s%>'s favor <S%H7522><s%> is toward a servant <S%H5650><s%> that dealeth wisely <S%H7919><s%>; But his wrath <S%H5678><s%> will be against him that causeth shame <S%H954><s%>.
